author: Staff Reporter
text:
A total of 83 Makkal Nala Paniyalargal (welfare workers), including 35 women, courted arrest here on Wednesday while staging a ‘begging bowl’ demonstration demanding their reinstatement.

They staged the demonstration near Tamil Nadu Government Employees Association here on Palayamkottai road. The protesters demanded that the government to reinstate them as directed by the High Court. Later, they were released.
title: 83 workers arrested
